description: Cole Escola plays Mary Todd Lincoln in drag in this delightfully campy queer romp, which has moved uptown to goose a sleepy Broadway summer.
title: ‘Oh, Mary!’ Is a Splendidly Nasty Farce You Will Not Want to Miss

description: The auction house has opened its annual The Dog Sale for online bidding in advance of the live sale in Edinburgh on July 24.
title: Bonhams Is Celebrating the Dog Days of Summer

description: Cowboy hats, jump ropes and wired headphones are making an appearance at this year's "summer camp for billionaires."
title: Sun Valley’s Unexpected Fashion: From Sam Altman’s Mysterious Backpack to Vintage Apple Earphones

description: What could be better than a book where each and every ‘chapter’ gives you something new—new ideas, new casts of characters and even new worlds to explore?
title: Eleven Short Story Collections That Will Get You Back Into Reading

description: Venture capital firms like Andreessen Horowitz are creating A.I. chips stashes to take advantage of soaring demand.
title: VC Firms Are Stocking Up on Nvidia A.I. Chips to Win Deals Amid GPU Shortage

description: It’s no small feat to steer the art world’s denizens to one place post-Art Basel, so we caught up with the gala committee members and museum director to learn how the week comes together.
title: Art Talk: Jen Rubio, Sarah Arison and Nicola Lees On Aspen ArtWeek and ArtCrush

description: As the sidewalks sizzle, there's no better time to embark on a gastronomic tour of the city's latest and greatest.
title: From Bodega to Bistro, These 9 New NYC Restaurants Serve Summer on a Plate

description: This unique exhibition effectively reveals the unexpected and largely unexplored connections between the art of the Modern American master and the Japanese aesthetic.
title: Calder and the Japanese Effect: A Major Show Celebrates Pace Gallery in Tokyo

description: Sauvignon blanc is a dry and acidic white wine with a zingy finish, alongside fresh fruit flavors. Some bottles boast earthy and herbaceous notes, making it the perfect white wine to sip during summer.
title: The Best West Coast Wineries for Sipping Sauvignon Blanc
